languages.text: {n}Высокий бритый наголо мужчина нервно потирает руки. Богатая одежда едва ли не трещит на его мускулистом теле, его лицо крайне мрачно. Тем не менее, он пытается изобразить приветливость:{/n} "Приветствую! Вы, должно быть..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Высокий бритый наголо мужчина нервно потирает руки. Богатая одежда едва ли не трещит на его мускулистом теле, его лицо крайне мрачно. Тем не менее, он пытается изобразить приветливость:{/n} "Приветствую! Вы, должно быть..."

languages.text: {n}The tall man with a shaved head is rubbing his hands together nervously. His opulent clothes are nearly bursting at the seams on his muscular body, and his expression is forbiddingly grim. Still, he's trying to put on an air of friendliness.{/n} "Greetings! You must be..."
languages.original_text: {n}Высокий бритый наголо мужчина нервно потирает руки. Богатая одежда едва ли не трещит на его мускулистом теле, его лицо крайне мрачно. Тем не менее, он пытается изобразить приветливость:{/n} "Приветствую! Вы, должно быть..."

traits.locale_text: {n}A tall man with a shaved head is rubbing his hands together nervously. His fancy clothes are nearly bursting at the seams on his muscular body, and his expression is profoundly grim. Still, he's trying to put on an air of friendliness.{/n} "Greetings! You must be..."

{n}A tall man with a shaved head is rubbing his hands together nervously. His fancy clothes are nearly bursting at the seams on his muscular body, and his expression is profoundly grim. Still, he's trying to put on an air of friendliness.{/n} "Greetings! You must be..."

{n}The tall man with a shaved head is rubbing his hands together nervously. His opulent clothes are nearly bursting at the seams on his muscular body, and his expression is forbiddingly grim. Still, he's trying to put on an air of friendliness.{/n} "Greetings! You must be..."

{n}The tall man with a shaved head is rubbing his hands together nervously. His opulent clothes are nearly bursting at the seams on his muscular body, and his expression is forbiddingly grim. Still, he's trying to put on an air of friendliness.{/n} "Greetings! You must be..."

languages.text: {n}剃着光头的高个子男人正紧张地搓着手。他身上的肌肉几乎要把他奢华的衣服撑破了，表情严峻得令人不敢恭维。但即便如此，他依然在努力做出一副友善的样子。{/n}“你好！你一定是……”
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man with a shaved head is rubbing his hands together nervously. His opulent clothes are nearly bursting at the seams on his muscular body, and his expression is forbiddingly grim. Still, he's trying to put on an air of friendliness.{/n} "Greetings! You must be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}剃着光头的高个子男人正紧张地搓着手。他身上的肌肉几乎要把他奢华的衣服撑破了，表情严峻得令人不敢恭维。但即便如此，他依然在努力做出一副友善的样子。{/n}“你好！你一定是……”

languages.text: {n}El hombre alto de cabeza afeitada se frota las manos, nervioso. Sus vestimentas caras parecen estar a punto de rasgarse por el tamaño de sus músculos, y su expresión es siniestra e intimidante. Aun así, trata de mostrarse agradable.{/n} «¡Saludos! Usted debe de ser...».
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man with a shaved head is rubbing his hands together nervously. His opulent clothes are nearly bursting at the seams on his muscular body, and his expression is forbiddingly grim. Still, he's trying to put on an air of friendliness.{/n} "Greetings! You must be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre alto de cabeza afeitada se frota las manos, nervioso. Sus vestimentas caras parecen estar a punto de rasgarse por el tamaño de sus músculos, y su expresión es siniestra e intimidante. Aun así, trata de mostrarse agradable.{/n} «¡Saludos! Usted debe de ser...».

languages.text: {n}頭が丸刈りの背の高い男が、神経質そうに両手をこすり合わせている。豪華な服は彼の筋肉質な身体のせいではじけそうになっており、表情も険しい。それでも、彼は親し気な雰囲気を出そうと努めている。{/n}「こんにちは！あなたは…」
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man with a shaved head is rubbing his hands together nervously. His opulent clothes are nearly bursting at the seams on his muscular body, and his expression is forbiddingly grim. Still, he's trying to put on an air of friendliness.{/n} "Greetings! You must be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}頭が丸刈りの背の高い男が、神経質そうに両手をこすり合わせている。豪華な服は彼の筋肉質な身体のせいではじけそうになっており、表情も険しい。それでも、彼は親し気な雰囲気を出そうと努めている。{/n}「こんにちは！あなたは…」

languages.text: {n}Der große Mann mit rasiertem Schädel reibt sich nervös die Hände. Seine prachtvolle Kleidung platzt aufgrund seines muskulösen Körpers fast aus den Nähten, und seine Miene ist bedrohlich grimmig. Dennoch versucht er, freundlich zu wirken.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt! Ihr seid bestimmt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man with a shaved head is rubbing his hands together nervously. His opulent clothes are nearly bursting at the seams on his muscular body, and his expression is forbiddingly grim. Still, he's trying to put on an air of friendliness.{/n} "Greetings! You must be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der große Mann mit rasiertem Schädel reibt sich nervös die Hände. Seine prachtvolle Kleidung platzt aufgrund seines muskulösen Körpers fast aus den Nähten, und seine Miene ist bedrohlich grimmig. Dennoch versucht er, freundlich zu wirken.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt! Ihr seid bestimmt ..."

languages.text: {n}Un homme de grande taille au crâne rasé, vêtu de vêtements opulents tendus à craquer par sa forte musculature, se frotte nerveusement les mains. Bien qu'il tente de paraître amical, vous décelez une once d'hostilité dans son expression.{/n} « Salutations ! Vous devez être... »
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man with a shaved head is rubbing his hands together nervously. His opulent clothes are nearly bursting at the seams on his muscular body, and his expression is forbiddingly grim. Still, he's trying to put on an air of friendliness.{/n} "Greetings! You must be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme de grande taille au crâne rasé, vêtu de vêtements opulents tendus à craquer par sa forte musculature, se frotte nerveusement les mains. Bien qu'il tente de paraître amical, vous décelez une once d'hostilité dans son expression.{/n} « Salutations ! Vous devez être... »

languages.text: {n}Saçları kazınmış uzun boylu adam, ellerini gergince ovuşturuyor. Kaslı vücuduna geçirdiği gösterişli kıyafetlerinin dikişleri her an atacakmış gibi gözüküyor. Yüz hatları ise göz korkutacak denli sert. Tüm bunlara rağmen dostane bir tavır takınmaya çabalıyor.{/n} "Selamlar! Siz..."
languages.original_text: {n}The tall man with a shaved head is rubbing his hands together nervously. His opulent clothes are nearly bursting at the seams on his muscular body, and his expression is forbiddingly grim. Still, he's trying to put on an air of friendliness.{/n} "Greetings! You must be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Saçları kazınmış, uzun saçlı adam ellerini gergince ovalıyor. Kaslı bedeni yüzünden gösterişli kıyafetlerinin dikişleri atacakmış gibi gözüküyor. Yüz ifadesi korkutucu derecede gaddar. Fakat dostane bir tavır sergilemeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Selamlar! Siz..."
